name: poezio
description: Docker repo for the poezio XMPP client.
full_description:
This is the repository for poezio (https://poez.io), and the Dockerfile used to build those images is available [here](https://git.poez.io/poezio/tree/Dockerfile).

When running the container, you have to allocate a pseudo-tty (``-t``) and run it interactively (``-i``). It is recommended to share the ``TERM`` env var (``-e TERM``) in order to have correct terminfo colors, and to have a persistent configuration, logs and whatnot, you have to share those directories as well (``-v ~/.config/poezio:/home/poezio-user/.config/poezio`` and ``-v ~/.local/share/poezio:/home/poezio-user/.local/share/poezio``).
